Shareholder Name: Abdulaziz M Al Namlah Holding Group
Abdul Aziz Mohamad Suleiman Al Namlah
Aziz Mohammed Mubarek Al Fahad Al Gahtani

Description: Middle East Specialized Cables (known as: Mesc) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since December 2007. Mesc operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Electrical Components and Equipment. It has Companies operating across Jordan and UAE, working on Electrical Components and Equipment and Heavy Electrical Equipment. Mesc is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1992.
